## `LogError`

Sends an error message\index{log report!sending messages to} to program's logging system.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
LogError(string errorMessage)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `string` errorMessage | The error message to log. |

[`Debug.Print()`](#print)
